name: Boy Falls For Princess
description:
DISCLAIMER: The game file when downloaded is called "Stacked-Men".
 When the game ends, it just stops in the last level. Also we started the Game Jam Saturday evening and did not skimp on sleep.

The prince wants to reach the princess of the other side of the clif. With the help of some (not so) willing peasants, will he be able to reach the princess and win her heart? Or will he fall hard to his doom..

Play with sound on for best experience.

To move the peasant tower, use the left and right arrow keys. To tip the tower, press space and pray you reach your goal!
